name: Whatever Will Be Will Be
description:
IMPORTANT : Play on your computer. It may take a while to load depending on your connection.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A game I colloborated with Peer-Minded (https://www.peer-minded.com/), to give message to university students about self discovery. Currently in beta stage. 

How to play : Left and Right Arrow Keys. Once loaded, you can go full screen.

Credits 

------------------------ 

A Project by Peer-Minded (https://www.peer-minded.com/)

Game Development and Screenplay : Pi Ko (https://paingthet.com)

Voice Acting : Jennifer Tsai and Pi Ko

Music used from https://www.FesliyanStudios.com

This work uses the 3D models from following authors under the permission of Creative Commons 4.0 license.
